sentences.en: A gas in thermal equilibrium has particles of all velocities.
sentences.cn: 处于热平衡的气体,其粒子有一切速度.

sentences.en: A thermal current flows away from the contact in an identical way.
sentences.cn: 一股热流从接触点以同等方式向外流出去.

sentences.en: At room temperature, the thermal conductivity of a diamond is about six times higher than that of a piece of copper.
sentences.cn: 在室温下, 钻石的热传导律比铜块高六倍左右.

sentences.en: At room temperature, thermal excitation can produce an unwanted current.
sentences.cn: 在温室下, 热激发可能产生所不需要的电流.

sentences.en: He was found by a police helicopter using thermal imaging equipment.
sentences.cn: 一架警用直升机借助热成像设备找到了他。

sentences.en: I put on my thermal leggings, long socks and the rest of my clothes.
sentences.cn: 我穿上保暖紧身裤、长袜和其他衣服。

sentences.en: In materials marked by low thermal diffusivity, the absorption is good.
sentences.cn: 热扩散率低的物质吸收性好.

sentences.en: It is said that the magnetite was formed by a chemical process called thermal decomposition.
sentences.cn: 据说这枚陨星是在热分解的化学过程中形成的。

sentences.en: My feet were like blocks of ice despite the thermal socks.
sentences.cn: 虽然穿了保暖袜子，我的双脚还是像冰块一样。

sentences.en: Sedimentary loading with consequent thermal blanketing will become major factors.
sentences.cn: 随着热熄灭作用以后,沉积载荷将变成主要因素.

sentences.en: The atomic reactor generates enormous amounts of thermal energy.
sentences.cn: 原子反应堆发出大量的热能.

sentences.en: The relaxation is due to the interactions with the thermal excitations.
sentences.cn: 弛豫是由热激发相互作用而产生.

sentences.en: The thermal radiation of shorter wavelengths than the visible are called ultraviolet.
sentences.cn: 波长短于可见光的热辐射称紫外线.

sentences.en: Thermal engines , be they large or small, have to consume fuel.
sentences.cn: 热机不论大小都需要消耗燃料.

sentences.en: They will build another thermal power station.
sentences.cn: 他们要另外建一座热能发电站.
